To, 
1.   Chairman, Central Committee, DGCA, Opp. Of SafdarJung airport New Delhi   
2. Chairman, Aerodrome Committee, Delhi/Mumbai/Kolkata&Chennai Airports 
3. RDCOS, BCAS-Delhi/Mumbai/Kolkata & Chennai to please to circulate to all airports.  
4. MCA (Smt.SaradaAli Khan, DS), RG Bhawan, New Delhi 
5. IB (Smt.Neelmani N.Raju, JD) East Block, R.K. Puram, New Delhi 
6. Shri Sarad Kumar, Joint Secretary Cabinet Sectt, Vikamer House, New Delhi

that any change in name /telephone no .of psychiatrists may be intimated to this Bureau. 
9. General Manager (ATC), AAI, New ATC Building, IGI Airport, New Delhi.
